title: Installing Red Hat Virtualization as a self-hosted engine using the command line
subtitle: Using the command line to install the Red Hat Virtualization Manager as a virtual machine running on the same hosts it manages

abstract.para: This document describes how to install a self-hosted engine environment – where the Red Hat Virtualization Manager (or "engine") is installed on a virtual machine that runs on specialized hosts in the same environment it manages – using the command line to configure and run an automated installation. If this is not the configuration you want to use, see the other Installation Options in the Product Guide.
